posts.post_content:
This exact card last sold in Heritage 4 years ago for $8000 - [url]https://sports.ha.com/itm/baseball-cards/singles-pre-1930-/1909-11-t206-hindu-brown-christy-mathewson-portrait-sgc-good-2/a/50015-80181.s?type=VCP50015[/url]

Asking $14k net to me, I will pick up shipping 

PM with inquiries.
I'd say good luck, Ryan, but you won't need it here. Fantastic card. In all my years of collecting, I've seen a lot less Matty Port. Hindus than the other major Hindus in the set.
Wow, I'm glad I'm an E-card guy, if I wasn't cards like this would be way too tempting.  Fantastic card and congrats to whoever adds this to their collection.

[quote name="Casey2296" post=2347842]Wow, I'm glad I'm an E-card guy, if I wasn't cards like this would be way too tempting.  Fantastic card and congrats to whoever adds this to their collection.[/QUOTE]

Plus one, except replace "E-card guy" with "WaJo-card guy." :)
